main.name: Kevin Downs
main.description: I'm a Linguist turned Full Stack Engineer with a background in Healthcare and Customer Service, currently looking for opportunities as a Junior Developer
main.bio: I have been a language lover my entire life, and as a video game hobbyist I eventually discovered programming for myself. After years of casually self studying, I realized that computer languages weren't all that different from human ones. At the end of 2019, I decided to finally make the jump and enroll in Flatiron School's Full Stack Engineering program. Having graduated, I am now experienced in Ruby, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, and React and looking for new opportunities as a Junior Developer. I am Philadelphia based, but experienced and comfortable with remote work and always looking for new tools to add to my toolbox.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to email me directly at kevin.downs04@gmail.com with inquiries or opportunities. You can also use the form below to contact me and I'll be sure to respond as soon as possible!

resume.skillmessage: Below are some of the technologies I am comfortable in and have used to build projects.

education.description: Full Stack program focused on the fundamentals of OOP and web technologies. Back end curriculum included Ruby and Rails, with front end focusing on Javascript and React. Curriculum also covered best practices and patterns such as CRUD and REST.

Bachelor of Arts program focused on the development of advanced Spanish language skills. Specific areas of study include Latin American and Hispanic Literature and Culture, Translation Skills, and various linguistic focuses.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
